value:
I wonder what's hiding inside this
egg? Oh! I bet it's a wyvern!

Macedonian winters are so harsh...
I'm always grateful when the spring
comes along. The sun feels so good!

*sigh* The warmth makes me a little
sleepy. Maybe I'll take a short nap.

Prince Alfonse and Princess Sharena
are both dressed as rabbits! Hehe,
there are so many rabbits about.

Look at me! I'm a fluffy rabbit! I even
have cute floppy ears and a puffy tail.

Hippity hop! I've come to deliver
some spring cheer from
$Nf!

I'm so glad I became a rabbit! Seeing
everyone smile makes me so happy!

If I hop around a lot, maybe I can get
big and strong like my brother and
sister...

Oh...I guess I just got carried away
by the festivities...

Wow, this must be a present from
spring itself! I'll be sure to cherish it!

Hop hop! I'm Maria, and I'm a
princess from Macedon. But now I'm
a rabbit! I can't wait for the festival!

Thank you so much for inviting me to
the spring festival.$k$pI had so much fun dressing up as a
rabbit and hopping around.$k$pBut more than that, I was so happy to
see everyone smiling and celebrating.$k$pEven my brother and sister enjoyed
themselves. I just wish they smiled
like that all of the time...$k$pI have to believe that someday, they
will always be that happy. I can't give
up on that hope!$k$pWith your help, I know we can make
every day as happy and warm as the
spring festival.
それっ
やあー！
きゃあっ
やめて…
It's springtime!
Feel the breeze!
It's sunny. Let's go!
Bunny on a mission!
But it was so nice out...
うふふ
This spring festival outfit is just adorable. I love it!
Oh! Hey, be careful with my ears!
I received this weapon for the festival. I hope I can use it well!
I just love bunny rabbits. They're so adorable!
I've heard that at some festivals, you can get candy. Is this one of them?
I wish I could walk through this festival with my brother and sister by my side...
I found a nice patch of grass where we could sit and watch the festival together. Want to join me?
OK!
This way?
Hippity-hop!
